pond.desc: The homey, shallow pond where you were born.  There's a carp swimming around here.

swamp.desc: The water here is murky, but you see a towering giraffe.

trail.desc: This well-worn path is marked with many adventures.  You see a pudgy toad.

wetland.desc: The many disconnected pools are separated by reeds and mud.  You see a deer struggling to move.

empty plot.desc: An unused plot of land.  You see a turtle basking in the sun.

log.desc: A gigantic tree has fallen here.  It's too big to simply walk over.

grasslands.desc: A wide sea of grass stretching to the horizon.  You see a sneaky scorpion hiding here.

stream.desc: You feel the current pulling you north.

lake.desc: A massive lake home to many creatures.  You see a dock at the north end.

dock.desc: An ancient oak dock.  You hear the croaks of other frogs trying to find a mate.
